dcterms:creator: J. Levine
C. B. Congdon
M. Ebner
G. Kendall
S. M. Lucas
R. M. and T. Schaul
T. Thompson
dcterms:description: General Video Game Playing (GVGP) is a field of Artificial Intelligence where agents play a variety of real-time video games that are unknown in advance.
dcterms:title: General Video Game Playing (GVGP)

dcterms:creator: M. G. Bellemare
Y. Naddaf
J. Veness
M. Bowling
dcterms:description: The Arcade Learning Environment (ALE) is a framework for developing agents that can play games of the Atari 2600 console.
dcterms:title: Arcade Learning Environment (ALE)

dcterms:creator: D. Perez
S. Samothrakis
J. Togelius
T. Schaul
S. M. Lucas
A. Couetoux
J. Lee
C.-U. Lim
T. Thompson
dcterms:description: The GVG-AI framework allows agents to play a variety of games that are unknown in advance and is used in the GVG-AI Competition.
dcterms:title: GVG-AI

dcterms:creator: M. Ebner
J. Levine
S. M. Lucas
T. Schaul
T. Thompson
J. Togelius
dcterms:description: The Video Game Description Language is a framework for describing video games in a way that can be understood by agents.
dcterms:title: Video Game Description Language

dcterms:creator: D. Perez-Liebana
S. Samothrakis
J. Togelius
S. M. Lucas
T. Schaul
dcterms:description: The GVG-AI Competition is an event where agents compete in various games, focusing on challenges and opportunities in General Video Game AI.
dcterms:title: GVG-AI Competition

dcterms:creator: T. Pepels
M. H. M. Winands
M. Lanctot
dcterms:description: Real-Time Monte Carlo Tree Search in Ms Pac-Man is a study on applying MCTS in a real-time game environment.
dcterms:title: Ms Pac-Man

dcterms:creator: T. Geffner
H. Geffner
dcterms:description: Width-Based Planning for General Video-Game Playing discusses a planning approach for video games using width-based techniques.
dcterms:title: Iterated Width (IW)

dcterms:creator: D. Perez
S. Samothrakis
S. Lucas
dcterms:description: Knowledge-based Fast Evolutionary MCTS is a method that enhances MCTS for General Video Game Playing using knowledge-based techniques.
dcterms:title: Knowledge-based Fast Evolutionary MCTS
